title: Announcement, Keep the Irregularities Inconsistent, 1993
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink across lower left quadrant: DESIGNED FOR AND BY: THE ABOVE
inscribed:
Recto: Upper two thirds of sheet, dispersed about the sketch, in black: edward/ fella/ the letter "o"/ FROM SHT NY SHOE IO/ "ME AS WELL AS YOU."/ IN DESIGN/ no/ a self portait idea!!!; across the lower right quadrant: NO NO NO/ 3 Fold/ Try the eyes/ 4 part highLIGHTS w/ letter 'O' or 'Q' question/ THE EYES on this case/ DON'T HAVE IT!!!  DOESN"T WORK/ all to retro, push pin 70's SLICK/* Too cartoon ie/* GIVE IT UP!/ What about NOSE?/ ED FELLA:/ SLIDE PRESENTATION/ OF WORK in GRAPHIC DESIGN/ WEDNESDAY FEB. 10th 1993/ CRANBROOK ACADEMY OF ART MUSEUM AUDITORIUM/ USE/ BACK/ LOVE the/ BAD STAT/ x/ mouth w/ "SMILE"/ a AIGA Detroit Chapter/ CBA DESIGN Department EVENT/ 7:30pm AIGA Members FREE/ ADMISSION $5/ BEARD/ w/*/ slogans/ SAYINGS+/ BITS of TYPEwork/ one LINERS in Various typefaces/* a Perfect opportunity time to indulge my/ self in one of THOSE PROCESS PIECES/ & SEE HOW/ I STRUGGLE/ and SWEAT the/ DETAILS.../ (here's my lame but oh/ so creative way OF WORKING!)/ w/*-POMO WIT- 

Verso: imprinted in black across upper two thirds of sheet: KEEP THE/IRREGULARITIES INCONSISTENT,/VARIOUSLY DIFFERENTIATED,/AND OTHERWISE UNMATCHED/ IN ALL MANNER OF WAYS/ AND VARIETY OF SORTS./ 'DEED I DO./ SO, SO; across lower left quadrant: Design Department/ CRANBROOK ACADEMY of ART (and DESIGN)/ P.O. BOX 801/ BloomField Hills MICHIGAN 48303-0801; at lower third of right edge: NON-PROFIT/ ORGANIZATION/U.S. Postage/ PAID/ PERMIT NO 3/ BloomField Hills MI

* The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster announcement printed in black ink for Ed Fella slide presentation, designed to be mailed.     
 
Recto: Upper two thirds of sheet, imprinted sketch of ideas for self portrait, including notes, circles, letters, symbols.  Across lower right quadrant, imprinted handwritten notes, including comments, description of event, location, date, time, additional information.

Verso: Upper left quadrant, small hand.  Across center sheet, black text in variety of sizes, styles, gold star sticker affixed.  Across lower sheet, mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Keep the Irregularities Inconsistent, 1993. Offset lithograph on cream paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-9
